label: A6B2C_hP9_189_fg_c_b-001
title: $\beta_{1}$-K$_{2}$UF$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
$\alpha$-K$_{2}$UF$_{6}$ is in the cubic \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_cF12_225_a_c-001}{fluorite ($C1$, CaF$_{2}$) structure}, with the potassium and uranium atoms placed randomly on the calcium sites. 
 $\beta_{2}$-K$_{2}$UF$_{6}$ takes on the trigonal \href{current_web_home_dir/A6B2C_hP9_150_ef_d_a-001}{$\beta$-Na$_{2}$ThF$_{6}$ structure}.
